name: Goin' for a Ride
description:
Hey y'all, this was made for Train Jam 2019! The theme was "Circuitous", so I made a game with no end or win condition. Players may ride the elevator up and down as much as they please, and visit the various floors that are available. 

Press "Enter" to activate the UI menu. The UI menu can be called up once the doors close after reaching the new floor.

Use the arrow keys to navigate the menu.

Press "Enter" to select a choice.

Press "Escape" to exit the UI menu while in the UI menu

Press "Escape" to quit the application while not in the UI menu

Huge thanks to Adiel & the Train Jam crew to make this an unforgettable experience! It was a blast

Credits: 

Nolan Sadowski - Programming, Art, Sound FX

Maize Wallin - Music
